msItem.title: Munivāhanabhogaḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: It's a theological text by a Vaṭakalai Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="1"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmate śrīnivāsa saṃyamimdra mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ śrīraṅganāyakyai namaḥ śrīraṅganāthaparabrahmaṇe - - - <lb n="2"/>śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi -
msItem.incipit: <pb n="1"/> <lb n="2"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>praṇatiṃ veṃkaṭeśasya padayor padadhīmahi - yadukyayor pati…
msItem.colophon: <pb n="14v"/> <lb n="1"/>kavitārkika simhāya kalyāṇaguṇaśāline śrīmate veṅkaṭeśāya vedāntagurave namaḥ - śrīmadvedāntagurave namaḥ śrī macchrīveṃkaṭā <lb n="2"/>ryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmategopālārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīraṅganāyikāsameta śrīraṅga<lb n="3"/>nāthaparabrahmaṇe śrī alamelumaṅgasameta śrī śrīnivāsaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ உ

msItem.title: Tiruppāvai with a gloss
msItem.author: Āṇṭāḷ and unknown
msItem.incipit: <pb n="1v"/> <lb n="1"/>goṣpadam neddhāradyutimān ṣaceṣṭayā eṣannārāyaṇa śrīmān kṣīrārṇava niketanaḥ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="20r"/> <lb n="4"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>śrīkṛṣṇapādamiśre<lb n="5"/>ṇa godāsūktyāḥ kṛtāṃ purā. vyākhyāñcadavāmayedānīṃ gīrvāṇena kṛtāmudā. iti tiruppāvai vyākhyā samāptā உ hariḥ om உ <lb n="6"/>śrīmatyai godāyai namaḥ - śrī macchrīveṃkaṭāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa saṃyamisārvabhaumāya namaḥ - śrīmategopāladeśikamahā <lb n="7"/>gurave namaḥ śrībhūminīḷā sa śrīraṅganāyikāsameta śrīraṅganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ śrībhūminīḷā alamelumaṅgasameta śrī śrīnivāsaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ śubhamastu —— <lb n="8"/>mānmathe vṛścike śukle caikādaśyāṃ vidhośri?ne | godoktiṭīkāṃ sulabhām vyalikhan narakesarī śrīmadvedāntarāmānujasaṃyamisārvabhauma mahādeśikāya namaḥ

msItem.title: Tiruppaḷḷieḻucci vyākhyānam
msItem.author: Toṇṭaraṭippoṭi Āḻvār and Nañcīyar

filiation.p: This is a Manipravala text by a Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya (ca 13th century).

msItem.rubric: <pb n="21r"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa saṃyamisārvabhaumāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ - <lb n="2"/>śrīraṅganāyakyai namaḥ śrīraṅganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ - om -
msItem.incipit: <pb n="21r"/> <lb n="2"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>anādimāyayā supto yadā jīvaḥ prabudhyate eṉkiṟapaṭiye anādikālamajñānattālē yā(sic)ṟaṅkukiṟa ivaraip pe<lb n="3"/>riya perumāḷ tammoṭaiya niravi(sic)dhikakṛpaiyālē yuṇarttiyaruḷa vuṇarntu…
msItem.explicit: <pb n="25v"/> <lb n="7"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>śeṣatvattiṉuṭaiya vellaiyile neṟittiṉa devar aṭiyēṉukkākat tiruppaḷḷiyuṇarntaruḷi aṭimai koṇṭaruḷaveṇumeṉakiṟār உ 10 உ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="25v"/> <lb n="8"/>hariḥ om śubhamastu toṇṭaṟaṭipoṭiyāḻavār tiruvaṭikaḷē caṟaṇam. śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate gopā<lb n="9"/>lāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīraṅganāyikāsameta śrīraṅganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ உ tiruppaḷḷiyaḻicci vyākhyā samāptā உ

msItem.title: Pradhānaśatakaṃ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate nigamānta mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīraṅganāthapara<lb n="2"/>brahmaṇe namaḥ - om உ śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi -
msItem.incipit: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="2"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>paravidupadarśitaṃ naḥ pradhānaśatakaṃ pramāṇasiddhamidam - bhajati śatakoṭibhāvaṃ parapakṣe ca prayojane ca stāṃ . poṅku puṉal āṟukaḷilp puvaṉam ellām…
msItem.explicit: <pb n="7v"/> <lb n="4"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>vāciyaṟintavai vaiyuraittom vaiyyattuḷḷir vaippākavivai<lb n="5"/>koṇtu makiḻmiṉirē உ
msItem.finalRubric: <pb n="7v"/> <lb n="5"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>śrīmadveṅkatanāthassahṛdayahṛdayaprasādanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ - vyaktaṃ pradhānaśatakaṃ vyatan?ta kavikathakakatighaṭāsinmuh? - <lb n="6"/>iti kavitārkikasimhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu pradhānaśatakaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="7v"/> <lb n="6"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>kavitārkikasimhāya+ vedā<lb n="7"/>ntagurave namaḥ உ hari om śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ உ śrīrastu

msItem.title: Unknown

msItem.rubric: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmān + hṛdi உ

msItem.title: Śrīhastigirimāhātmyaṃ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="1"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa saṃyamisārvabhaumāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ - śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ ka<lb n="2"/>vitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi -
msItem.explicit: <pb n="8r"/> <lb n="7"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>kai koḷ kaṉi pōl nilam kaṇṭu - kavikathaka pantuvaktrastraiyyanta gurustriloka mahanīyam satyavrata mā<lb n="8"/>hātmyaṃ vyatanuta laḷitamiti v[eṅkaṭe]śaguruḥ -
msItem.finalRubric: <pb n="8r"/> <lb n="9"/>hariḥ om - iti kavitārkikasimhasya +vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu satyavratamāhātmyaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ உ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="8r"/> <lb n="9"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>śrīraṅganāyakyai namaḥ - <lb n="10"/>kavitārkikasimhāya + vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmate nigamānta gurave namaḥ śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ -

msItem.title: rahasyaśikhāmaṇiḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahāgurave namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo <lb n="2"/>me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi -
msItem.incipit: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="2"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>om sthiracarajaganmātuḥ kṣoṇyāḥ kvaciccaturarṇavī vīpadi sapadi kroḍakrīḍāṃ vibhāvayataḥ prabhoḥ | śrutiparipaṇaślokadvandvātmanā paripaktrimo <lb n="3"/> ramayatu manaḥ sattvasthānāṃ rahasyaśikhāmaṇiḥ - kvāpi kalpāntaveśante khuradaghne samuddhṛtām |vahate medinīmustāṃ mahate potriṇe namaḥ -
msItem.explicit: <pb n="10v"/> <lb n="2"/>kāṣṭhapāṣāṇasannibhaṃ | ahaṃ smarāmi mat(sic) bhaktaṃ nayāti paramāṃ gatiṃ | உ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="10v"/> <lb n="2"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>imau varāha caramaślokaṃ உ <lb n="3"/> etat vyākhyā rahasyaśikhāmaṇiḥ

msItem.title: Upakārasaṃgrahaḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi - śrīmate nigamānta gurave namaḥ
msItem.incipit: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="2"/>antamillā pēriṉpa māri arintavērkum aṭiyoṭamai yarivuṭaṉe yeṉṟu
msItem.explicit: <pb n="10v"/> <lb n="2"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>cuḻiyāta cevvaḻiyil to(sic)ṇaivarōṭē tu(sic)laiyāta <lb n="3"/>periṉpam mēl ētti aṟuḷāta aruḷāḻip perumāḷ ceyyumantamillāp pataviyellāmaḷappārārē -
msItem.finalRubric: <pb n="10v"/> <lb n="3"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>iti kavitārkika simhasya sarvatantra<lb n="4"/>svatantrasya śrī madveṅkaṭanāthasya atiṣṭha upakārasaṃgrahe tritīyodhikāraḥ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="10v"/> <lb n="4"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>hariḥ om upakārasaṃgrahasaṃpūrṇaḥ śrīrastu <lb n="5"/> kavitārkika simhāya kalyāṇaguṇaśāline śrīmate veṅkaṭeśāya vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ <lb n="6"/> śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate devaśikhāmaṇi tātārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ - <lb n="7"/>śrīmate nigamānta gurave namaḥ śrī śrīdharāsyarannamaḥ śrī alamelumaṅgasameta śrīnivāsaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ

msItem.title: Tattvasandeśaḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśīkāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryamahāgurave namaḥ śrīmate nigamānta gurave namaḥ - śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitā<lb n="2"/>rkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi
msItem.explicit: <pb n="3r"/> <lb n="3"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>nitye śeṣiṇi nikṣipannijabharaṃ sarvasahe śrīsakhe dharma dhāraya cātakasya kuśalin dhārādharaikāntinaḥ
msItem.finalRubric: <pb n="3r"/> <lb n="3"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>iti kavitārki<lb n="4"/>kasimhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu tatvasandeśassaṃpūrṇaḥ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="3r"/> <lb n="4"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>avitārkika simhāya + vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmate nigamānta mahādeśikāya namaḥ

msItem.title: Rahasyasandeśaḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="3r"/> <lb n="4"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>śrī śrīdhatāsyam namaḥ <lb n="5"/> śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi - உ
msItem.incipit: <pb n="3r"/> <lb n="5"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>yāṉaṟiyuṅcuṭarākiṉiṉṟeṉ mattumayātumallēṉ - vāṉamarun tirumālaṭiyeṉ mattor pattumileṉ -
msItem.explicit: <pb n="4r"/> <lb n="7"/>meliṅku nām piṟavom velaivaṇṇaṉai mevutume | śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthena śiṣyāṇāṃ hitamicchatā | itthaṃ rahasyasārārthaḥ saṅgṛhya samadarśyata ||
msItem.colophon: <pb n="4r"/> <lb n="7"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>iti kavitārki<lb n="8"/>kasimhasya + śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu rahasyasandeśaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ hariḥ om kavitārkika simhāya + vedāntagurave namaḥ

msItem.title: Rahasyasandeśavivaraṇaṃ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="4v"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi - śrīmate vedāntagurave namaḥ -
msItem.incipit: <pb n="4v"/> <lb n="2"/>rahasyasandeśattil śaraṇāgatiyiṉuṭaiya viṣayasvarūpaparikara viśeṣa phalaviśeṣaṅkaḷai prakāśippikkiṟa dvayameṉa …
msItem.explicit: <pb n="5v"/> <lb n="2"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>tiruvaṭikaḷ kūṭiṉai ṉāṅkaṇṭeṉṉaṟu kṛtakṛtyaṉāṉa tāṉ kṛtārthaṉākiṟāṉ.
msItem.colophon: <pb n="5v"/> <lb n="2"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>iti kavitārkikasimhasya + <lb n="3"/>śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu rahasyasandeśavivaraṇaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ | hariḥ om உ kavitārkikasimhāya + vedāntagurave namaḥ <lb n="4"/>śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ

msItem.title: Rahasyaratnāvalī

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="8v"/> <lb n="3"/>śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi - śrīmate nigamāntadeśikāya namaḥ உ śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ |

msItem.title: Tatvapadavī
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: <pb n="11r"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate nivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate nigamānta gurave namaḥ - śrīmadvedāntarāmānujamahā <lb n="2"/>deśikāya namaḥ - śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi உ
msItem.incipit: <pb n="11r"/> <lb n="2"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>prasādāddeśikendrāṇāṃ parāvaravibhā[ga]vit | prapannaḥ <lb n="3"/>paramātmānaṃ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam | …
msItem.explicit: <pb n="11v"/> <lb n="7"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>muktikkaruḷ cūṭa mūṉṉait teḷi muṉṉamittikkālē <lb n="8"/>ṟkumitam -
msItem.finalRubric: <pb n="11v"/> <lb n="8"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>iti kavitārkikasimhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu tatvapadavī saṃpūrṇā உ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="11v"/> <lb n="8"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>kavitārkika simhāya + vedāntagurave namaḥ

msItem.title: Rahasyapadavī
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.incipit: <pb n="12r"/> <lb n="1"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>anādikālaṃ saṃsarittupporntavātmākkaḷuṭaiya ujjīvanārthamāka adhyātmaśāstraṅkaḷ tattvahitapuruṣārthaṅkaḷai pratipādikkum.
msItem.explicit: <pb n="12v"/> <lb n="6"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>ākalpaṃ vadara (sic) vidhūtavairipakṣā bhūyasyā bhavadanukampayaiva bhūyāt |
msItem.finalRubric: <pb n="12v"/> <lb n="6"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>iti kavitārki<lb n="7"/>kasimhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu rahasyapadavī saṃpūrṇā உ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="12v"/> <lb n="7"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>hariḥ om kavitārkika simhāya kalyāṇaguṇa <lb n="8"/>śāline śrīmate veṅkaṭeśāya vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmadvedāntarāmānujamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ

extent.measure: 1 guard folio, 2 unnumbered folios (one with a kind of table of contents, and the second with Telugu writing). Foliation mostly begins whenever one of the 16 texts of this bundle begins (but not systematically for closely related texts). T1: 5 folios T2: 14 folios T3: 20 folios T4: 5 folios (double foliation, one in continuation with the work above, and one, new for this one) T5: 7 folios T6: 1 folio T7: 8 folios T8: 10 folios T9: 10 folios T10: 3 folios (foliation continues with all following works) T11: 2 folios T12: 2 folios T13: 2 folios T14: 1 folio T15: 2 folios T16: 1 folio T17: 2 folios A couple of leaves are found at the end, listing few works byVedānta Deśika and the number of verses found in them.
